      • changePassword

        void changePassword(User user)
        Changes user's password from the database.
        Parameters:
        user - we are want to change.

      • getTaxiList

        java.util.List<Taxi> getTaxiList()
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        searches all taxi drivers from database and forms it into the list.
        Returns:
        all taxi driver's information formed into the list.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there are problems with database connection.

      • getClientList

        java.util.List<Client> getClientList()
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        searches all clients from database and forms it into the list.
        Returns:
        all client's information formed into the list.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there are problems with database connection.

      • decreaseBonus

        void decreaseBonus(Client client,
                   int bonus)
            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Decreases the client's bonus count.
        Parameters:
        client - whose bonus count we are want to decrease.
        bonus - count we are want to decrease. (how much clients spend)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there are problems with database connection.

      • changeBonusCount

               throws java.sql.SQLException

      • changeTaxiCar

        void changeTaxiCar(Taxi taxi)
            throws java.sql.SQLException
        changes a taxi's driver car to another car which stored in taxi object.
        Parameters:
        taxi - stored taxi driver id and car we are want to change.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there are problems with database connection.

      • getHashPassword

        java.lang.String getHashPassword(java.lang.String email)
        tries to find the client's password if user with that mail and password are registered.
        Parameters:
        email - client's e-mail
        Returns:
        hashed password value if it success otherwise null.

      • restorePassword

        boolean restorePassword(java.lang.String mail,
                        java.lang.String hashPassword,
                        java.lang.String newPassword)
        updates the database and sets a new password for a client.
        Parameters:
        mail - client's mail
        hashPassword - client's hashed password.
        newPassword - client's new password.
        Returns:
        true if it success otherwise false.
